Our partners

Digitized Events ticking

Our event ticketing service is a convenient and user-friendly platform that allows individuals to purchase tickets for various events, from concerts and sports games to theater productions and festivals. It simplifies the ticket-buying process, often offering digital ticket options, seat selection, and real-time event information, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable experience for event-goers. With secure payment processing, it provides a reliable way for both organizers and attendees to manage and access event tickets.

Why choose Runam

Movie sponsorship program

Our Movie Production Sponsorship Program is your ticket to becoming an integral part of the magic and glamour of the film industry. With this unique opportunity, you can align your brand with captivating storytelling and cinematic excellence.

Through this program, you'll have the chance to support the creation of compelling movies that leave a lasting impact on audiences worldwide. Your sponsorship not only fosters creativity but also provides exposure to a diverse and engaged audience

We offer tailored sponsorship packages that can include exclusive branding opportunities, on-screen acknowledgments, red-carpet premieres, and behind-the-scenes access to the filmmaking process. Your partnership will be showcased to industry insiders, media outlets, and film enthusiasts alike.

Join us in the world of cinema, where your support plays a vital role in bringing dreams to life on the silver screen. Elevate your brand's visibility, engage with a passionate audience, and become a part of the storytelling legacy through our Movie Production Sponsorship Program.
